content: There are a few other enemies to contend with when taking down the Mountain Patroller, so begin by trying to pick them off one by one. He will notice you eventually once you get close enough to him, but hopefully, you are able to dispose of a majority of the other enemies before he spots you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mountain_Patroller_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Mountain Patroller Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Mountain Patroller Fight Guide'.
The content is as follows:
There are a few other enemies to contend with when taking down the Mountain Patroller, so begin by trying to pick them off one by one. He will notice you eventually once you get close enough to him, but hopefully, you are able to dispose of a majority of the other enemies before he spots you.
